title: Weekly CXM Connect
description: The South CXM meeting is scheduled every Friday from 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM on Teams.

title: New DMS bulletin released on Booking experience
description: Check the DMS portal for the updated bulletin and ensure it is followed going forward.

title: CXM Recognition Program
description: The Q1 CXM assessment will be released shortly, along with recognition for the top-performing CXMs.
